metadata.description: Free VPN with no email or sign up required. Connect instantly with WireGuard encryption, built-in ad blocker & content filter. No logs. No data caps.

hero.subheadline: Connect instantly with WireGuard encryption. Your device is your account.

features.title: Designed for Complete Privacy
features.subtitle: Most VPNs ask for your email before protecting your privacy. Doppler doesn't.

noRegistration.title: Privacy Without Registration
noRegistration.description: Your device serves as your account. No email. No phone number. No personal information. Privacy begins the moment you connect.

wireguard.title: WireGuard Encryption
wireguard.description: Modern VPN protocol trusted by security professionals. Faster connections, better battery efficiency, and military-grade encryption.

adBlocker.title: Built-in Ad Blocker
adBlocker.description: Network-level blocking removes up to 75% of ads, trackers, and pop-ups. Faster page loads, less data usage, cleaner browsing.

contentFilter.title: Content Filter & Parental Controls
contentFilter.description: Block specific websites or entire categories. Password-protect settings. Create a safer internet for your family.

minimalData.title: Minimal Data Collection
minimalData.description: We don't log your browsing activity. We don't track websites you visit. Our architecture requires minimal data by design.

completelyFree.title: Completely Free
completelyFree.description: All servers are free with full functionality. Full encryption, unrestricted speeds, unlimited bandwidth. No premium tiers or feature restrictions.

howItWorks.title: Get started in seconds
howItWorks.subtitle: No registration, no hassle - just download and connect

download.title: Download
download.description: Get Doppler VPN from your device's app store

connect.title: Connect
connect.description: Open the app and tap connect - no account needed

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start with a 7-day free trial. Cancel anytime.
pricing.cardSubtitle: Same powerful features, choose your commitment
pricing.allFeaturesIncluded: All features included with every plan

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Doppler VPN

what.question: What is Doppler VPN?
what.answer: Doppler VPN is a privacy-focused virtual private network service that encrypts your internet connection and hides your IP address. It includes built-in ad blocking, content filtering by category, and support for custom blocklists - all without requiring registration.

noLogs.question: Is Doppler VPN really no-logs?
noLogs.answer: Yes, we operate a strict no-logs policy. We don't track, store, or share any of your browsing activity, connection timestamps, IP addresses, or any other personal data. Your privacy is our priority.

adBlocker.question: How does the ad blocker work?
adBlocker.answer: Our ad blocker works at the DNS level, blocking ads, trackers, and malicious domains before they even load. This means faster browsing, less data usage, and protection across all your apps - not just your browser.

categories.question: What content categories can I filter?
categories.answer: You can filter content across multiple categories including adult content, gambling, social media, gaming, streaming, and more. You can also import custom blocklists to have complete control over what's accessible.

devices.question: How many devices can I use?
devices.answer: A single Doppler VPN subscription covers up to 10 devices simultaneously. Use it on your phones, tablets, and computers - all protected at once.

platforms.question: What platforms are supported?
platforms.answer: Doppler VPN is available on iOS (iPhone & iPad), macOS, and Android. We're constantly working on expanding our platform support.

cancel.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: You can cancel your subscription anytime through your device's app store (App Store for iOS/macOS or Google Play for Android). Your access continues until the end of your billing period.

trial.question: Is there a free trial?
trial.answer: Yes! Every new user gets a 7-day free trial with full access to all features. Plus, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied.

doppler.subtitle: Privacy-first VPN with no registration. Connect instantly with WireGuard encryption.

simnetiq.subtitle: Global eSIM data plans for travelers. Stay connected anywhere in the world.

footer.description: Privacy-first VPN with advanced ad blocking and content filtering.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Doppler VPN, your privacy is our top priority. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your information when you use our service.

noLogs.title: No-Logs Policy
noLogs.content: We operate a strict no-logs policy. We do not track, store, or share any of the following: your browsing activity, connection timestamps, IP addresses, DNS queries, bandwidth usage, or any other data that could identify you or your online activities.

collect.title: What We Collect
collect.content: We only collect the minimum information necessary to provide our service: your email address (only if you contact support), payment information (processed securely by app stores), and anonymous, aggregated analytics to improve our service.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We use industry-standard encryption protocols including WireGuard to protect your connection. All data transmission between your device and our servers is encrypted end-to-end.

thirdParty.title: Third Parties
thirdParty.content: We do not sell, trade, or share your personal information with third parties. We may use trusted service providers (like app stores for payments) who are bound by strict confidentiality agreements.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@dopplervpn.com

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using Doppler VPN, you agree to these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.

service.title: Service Description
service.content: Doppler VPN provides a virtual private network service that encrypts your internet connection, includes ad blocking capabilities, and offers content filtering features. The service is provided "as is" and "as available."

usage.title: Acceptable Use
usage.content: You agree to use Doppler VPN only for lawful purposes. You may not use the service for any illegal activities, to harm others, to distribute malware, or to interfere with our service operations.

subscription.title: Subscriptions & Payments
subscription.content: Subscriptions are billed through the respective app stores (Apple App Store or Google Play). You can cancel your subscription at any time through your device's app store. Refunds are subject to the app store's refund policies and our 30-day money-back guarantee.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Doppler VPN shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes through the app or via email. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at legal@dopplervpn.com
